extendedInfo.description: Come be enthralled by Fractalâs music puzzler experience. Push, Combo, and Chain your way through a pulsing technicolor dreamscape while expanding your consciousness at 130 BPM.Three game modes let you explore this hexagonal universe: â¢ Campaign Mode takes you through a world of discovery, with each level offering new possibilities of play and expanding on challenges. â¢ Puzzle Mode pushes the gameâs mechanics to the limit in 50+ intense scenarios that will melt your brain. â¢Arcade Mode breaks down boundaries and turns on the timer, testing your reactions and ability to play as quickly as you possibly can."Fractal is a refreshing puzzler. Its cool aesthetic and subtle complexities intrigue you, while the thrill of chaining massive blooms in a dazzling array of light keeps you coming back for more."âGameSpot"Fractal is a beautiful game, marrying the elegance of its arithmetical visual logic with a colour palette delicately pipetted from nature."âEurogamer"[Fractal's] ambient soundtrack is gorgeous, the visuals are crisp and stylish and the game is strikingly original and fun. There are hours of mind-bending entertainment here."âTouchArcadeCIPHER PRIMECipher Prime is an award-winning Philadelphia game studio; we also made Auditorium, Splice, and Pulse: Volume One. Weâre a small company, small enough that the whole team could fit in a VW Bug (if we squished a little), and we really appreciate all the fans and soon-to-be fans that support us!

reviews.title: Smart and calm
reviews.comment: Great game, super nice atmosphere and smart puzzles... Perfectly adapted for tablets.
reviews.author: Cedric Francois

reviews.title: Beautifully made app that is also infuriating
reviews.comment: Very well-made app in general, but the small playing area makes accurate taps difficult. I often find it registering a tap on the wrong hexagon and losing a move, which throes the whole board off and is maddening. Other than this issue, it\'s a nice game.
reviews.author: Matthew Dye

reviews.title: Polished game
reviews.comment: Very good game. But needs to be tweaked a lil. It\'s kind of hard to select the hexagons you would like to move. You end up moving other hexagons that you don\'t want to.
reviews.author: michael ford

reviews.title: Nice and fun puzzle.
reviews.comment: The hexagons might be slightly hard to choose at times though.
reviews.author: eD hUAN

reviews.title: Extremely low res
reviews.comment: On the Nexus 10 the backgrounds and blocks in this game look horrible. Fun gameplay, but ceases to be aesthetically pleasing visually.
reviews.author: Kyle Riedemann

reviews.title: Almost great...
reviews.comment: Fractal is nearly there, but needs polish. For instance, hexagons become really hard to accurately hit on a mobile device and there\'s no undo button. Losing campaign levels because of this is frustrating.
reviews.author: mark whitehouse

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I bought another game from this developer and I liked it. So I decided to give this a try..and this is even better!! So much fun :)
reviews.author: Sean Oh

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love everything these guys make and this is no exception. So happy to finally see a game on android!
reviews.author: Michael Dwyer
